data.title: food
data.meta_description: Posts about food written by Style Cipher
data.text:
Tag: food

The Last Minute Plans

Even though we have seen the departmental stores filled with heart shaped candy boxes, super giant teddy bears or every other mushy thing possible since a while now, many of us on the morning of February 14th (my morning is almost afternoon on a no-school day) wake up with almost non existing valentines day plans.… Continue reading The Last Minute Plans

Gustatory Delights

The thought of this post struck me when I was watching the first new episode of Aahat (yeah I actually thought of watching it). I wanted to experiment if i could write better watching some mad stuff on TV. Lets see if I can. Well but these blogs don't really comment on the writing ability… Continue reading Gustatory Delights

The Tastebuds

Hi guys, I've been lost in a long slumber since a few weeks, but now I'm back; back with a promise to write blogs and reviews as frequently as I can. I apologize to everyone who's been waiting to know more about newly opened restaurants as well as already existing ones in Mumbai - but… Continue reading The Tastebuds

Exploring the Hiker’s Paradise

Discovering the East side of India was never my plan. Once i came across an itinerary and when i googled, i realized this place is next to heaven. Sikkim, a very small state but has people with very big hearts. This place is definitely worth visiting. People who are considering traveling to this place, one… Continue reading Exploring the Hiker’s Paradise
